title: Discover the people behind the network that revolutionized student communication
intro: We are a non-profit, non-partisan and neutral organization. We were born from the idea of making communication between students simpler and more direct, creating a space where everyone can feel part of a community. Here we share experiences, help each other and build together a network that looks at the present and the future of those who study.

contact.title: Want to get in touch with us?
contact.subtitle: Write us an email for any information or collaboration.
